Subject: Cookbook Lovers Unite.
Description: In spite of millions of recipes available on the Internet, some of us still love to collect and cook from cookbooks. This panel is for all you cookbook lovers (and wanna-be lovers) out there. Come share your favorite cookbooks, discuss what qualities make a great cookbook versus a, well, not-so-good cookbook, and compare notes on the tricky issue of how to organize a large cookbook collection.   Speakers include:Lisa Leutheuser - Track: Food  - Duration: 1 hour
